loan_application.title: Equipment Loan Application Form
loan_application.instructions: Please complete this form to request an equipment loan. All fields marked :star are required.

sections.equipment_info: Section 3: Equipment Information and Loan Period

labels.agree_declaration: I agree with the declaration above
labels.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel? All entered data will be lost.

placeholders.purpose_example: e.g. For project presentation at monthly meeting, training course, etc.

declaration.intro: I hereby acknowledge and confirm that:

items.1: All information provided in this form is true and accurate.
items.2: I will use the borrowed equipment responsibly and only for the official purposes stated.
items.3: I will return the equipment in good condition and by the specified date.
items.4: I am fully responsible for any damage or loss of the equipment during the loan period.
items.5: I will promptly report any damage or issues that occur to the equipment.
items.6: I understand that violation of these terms may result in disciplinary action and future loan restrictions.

loan_application.security_notice: Your information is protected and encrypted

notes.same_as_applicant: Check if the responsible officer information is the same as the applicant.

If you are experiencing critical system: If you are experiencing critical system outages, security incidents, or urgent issues affecting operations, please call our emergency hotline: +60 3-xxxx xxxx (24/7)
Low - Can wait, not blocking work: Low - Can wait, not blocking work
Please provide detailed information abou:
Please provide detailed information about the issue:
* What happened?
* When did it start occurring?
* What were you trying to do?
* Have you tried any solutions?
* Any error messages received?
Screenshots, documents, error messages (: Screenshots, documents, error messages (Max 5 files, 10MB each)
Supported: JPG, PNG, PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT: Supported: JPG, PNG, PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT
I consent to the collection, processing,: I consent to the collection, processing, and storage of my personal data for the purpose of ICT support ticket management. This data will be used to process my support request, send notifications about ticket status, and maintain support records in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.
Request/Ticket number not found. Please: Request/Ticket number not found. Please check and try again.

forms.terms.approval_requirement: Applications require approval from officers Grade 41 and above.
